note.p: Solicitor. Wrote a biography of the economist and educational reformer William Ellis, the founder of the Birkbeck Schools in London (1889). Lived in Hampstead, London.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/193/31/55), 1881 (RG11/173/14/21)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 March 2018)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 March 2018)
